original_text: The other descendants of Kohath received towns in land that belonged to the half tribe of Manasseh. They received Aner with its fields and Bileam with its fields.
korean_text: 또 그핫 자손의 남은 종족에게는 므낫세 반 지파 중에서 아넬과 그 초원과 빌르암과 그 초원을 주었더라

sentences.original_text: that belonged to the half tribe of Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 므낫세 반 지파에게 속한 것이었다

sentences.original_text: They received Aner with its fields
